name: The roots attack
description:
En una zona alejada del bullicio de la ciudad, se encuentra un laboratorio que busca "mejorar" la naturaleza, sin embargo, luego de xx8 días de investigación, el líder del laboratorio químico ha encontrado la forma de fabricar un fármaco que permitirá la naturaleza sea más fuerte y se propague más fácilmente esperando que esto ayude a restaurar el daño causado por la humanidad durante tantos años mientras la hambruna disminuye.

The time came for the real test of the drug and after a few minutes the satisfactory result of the investigation was seen, however the drug worked so well that the rate of expansion of the sample got out of control, forcing the evacuation of the laboratory and setting it on fire to control the Expansion of the roots, even so a portion of the roots has managed to leave the laboratory and has begun to claim everything that surrounds it as its own.

The laboratory leader has developed a drug to control the expansion but without being able to get closer to the origin of the sample, he can only run for his life while he waits and tries to contain the isolated outbreaks of plants that are emerging in the world.
